mapper.select: SELECT member.`name`, member.phone, member.sex, member.birthday, member.address, member_card.code, member_card.member_code, member_card.org_code, member_card.mall_group_code, member_card.open_mall_code, member_card.open_time, member_card.`level`, member_card.last_check_time, member_card.`status`, member_card.version FROM member_card JOIN member ON member_card.member_code = member.code ${ew.customSqlSegment}
select mall_group_code as group_code, max(code) as max_card_no from member_card group by mall_group_code
select max(code) as max_code from member_card group by mall_group_code
